mapper.select:
SELECT APLCNT_IDX , RECEIPT_DATE , APLCNT_BIZAREA , APLCNT_DEPT , APLCNT_CLASS , EMPLY_NUM , APLCNT_NM , BIRTHDAY , APLCNT_SEX , ADDR_DO , ADDR_SI , ADDR_GU , CONTACT_INFO , EMAIL , MARITAL_STTS , HIGHEST_EDU , MAJOR , CAREER_STTS , COMPANY1 , COMPANY_PERIOD1 , ASSIGNED_TASK1 , COMPANY2 , COMPANY_PERIOD2 , ASSIGNED_TASK2 , RECRUIT_SITE1 , RECRUIT_SITE2 , RECOMMENDER , DOC_ITVW , PHONE_ITVW , PHONE_ITVW_RESULT , PTOP_ITVW , INTERVIEWER , ITVW_DATE , ITVW_TIME , ITVW_ATTD , ITVW_RESULT , EDU_ATTD_ITTN_STTS , EDU_ATTD_STTS , EDU_DATE , JOB_DAY , PUT_DAY , QUIT_DAY , INID , INDT , UPID , UPDT , BLACKLIST FROM LBAPLCNTLIST
WHERE APLCNT_IDX = #{aplcntIdx}

SELECT APLCNT_IDX , RECEIPT_DATE , FN_GET_BIZAREA(APLCNT_BIZAREA) APLCNT_BIZAREA , FN_GET_DEPT(APLCNT_DEPT) APLCNT_DEPT , APLCNT_CLASS , EMPLY_NUM , APLCNT_NM , BIRTHDAY , APLCNT_SEX APLCNT_SEX_CD , FN_CMM_NM('SEX', APLCNT_SEX) APLCNT_SEX , ADDR_DO ADDR_DO_CD , ADDR_SI ADDR_SI_CD , ADDR_GU ADDR_GU_CD , FN_CMM_ADDR(ADDR_DO) ADDR_DO , FN_CMM_ADDR(ADDR_SI) ADDR_SI , FN_CMM_ADDR(ADDR_GU) ADDR_GU , CONTACT_INFO , EMAIL , MARITAL_STTS MARITAL_STTS_CD , FN_CMM_NM('OXSTTS', MARITAL_STTS) MARITAL_STTS , HIGHEST_EDU HIGHEST_EDU_CD , FN_CMM_NM('HIGHESTEDU', HIGHEST_EDU) HIGHEST_EDU , MAJOR , CAREER_STTS CAREER_STTS_CD , FN_CMM_NM('OXSTTS', CAREER_STTS) CAREER_STTS , COMPANY1 , COMPANY_PERIOD1 , ASSIGNED_TASK1 , COMPANY2 , COMPANY_PERIOD2 , ASSIGNED_TASK2 , BLACKLIST BLACKLIST_CD , FN_CMM_NM('OXSTTS', BLACKLIST) BLACKLIST , FN_CMM_NM('RECRUITSITE1', RECRUIT_SITE1) RECRUIT_SITE1 , FN_GET_RCS2('RECRUITSITE2', RECRUIT_SITE2, RECRUIT_SITE1) RECRUIT_SITE2 , RECOMMENDER , DOC_ITVW , PHONE_ITVW , FN_CMM_NM('PHONEITVWRESULT', PHONE_ITVW_RESULT) PHONE_ITVW_RESULT , PTOP_ITVW , INTERVIEWER , ITVW_DATE , ITVW_TIME , FN_CMM_NM('ATTDSTTS', ITVW_ATTD) ITVW_ATTD , FN_CMM_NM('ITVWRESULT', ITVW_RESULT) ITVW_RESULT , FN_CMM_NM('ATTDSTTS', EDU_ATTD_ITTN_STTS) EDU_ATTD_ITTN_STTS , FN_CMM_NM('ATTDSTTS', EDU_ATTD_STTS) EDU_ATTD_STTS , EDU_DATE , JOB_DAY , PUT_DAY , QUIT_DAY , INID , INDT , UPID , UPDT FROM LBAPLCNTLIST
WHERE APLCNT_IDX = #{aplcntIdx}
